panel.title: Current Snapshot: Windows Disk Usage Information

input.label: Host
input.populatingSearch: | inputlookup fb_hostname_index_cache | dedup orig_host | sort orig_host

table.searchString: host=$host$ source="Perfmon:Windows__LogicalDisk" counter="Free Megabytes" OR counter="% Free Space" instance!="_Total" | stats last(eval(if(counter="Free Megabytes", Value, null()))) AS Avail last(eval(if(counter="% Free Space", Value, null()))) AS UsePct by instance | eval UsePct=round(UsePct, 2) | rename instance AS MountedOn | `_fb_mbytes_pretty(Avail)` | table MountedOn, Avail, UsePct | sort MountedOn
